short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension which removes Youtube Shorts from Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes all references to shorts from youtube.com

#HOW TO USE
1. Go to Youtube.com
2. Press on the extension icon (If it is not present you must first pin the extension to your taskbar)
3. The icon will now display a green "ON" label and all shorts will be removed
4. To undo this simply press on the icon again
